name: Air Fryer Apple Crisp
author: Kim's Cooking Now
summary: Nothing screams fall like warm apple crisp! You can use any variety of apples that you like, but I prefer a mixture of tart (Granny Smith or MacIntosh) and sweet (Honeycrisp or Fuji). Using your air fryer is perfect for a small portion! Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream, if desired.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions
Butter a small oven-safe dish that will fit into the air fryer
Combine apples, water, sugar, cinnamon, and salt in a small bowl
Transfer into the prepared dish and cover tightly with aluminum foil
Place the dish inside the air fryer and set the timer for 10 minutes
Replace foil and set timer for another 10 minutes
Meanwhile, combine rolled oats, flour, brown sugar, and melted butter in a small bowl and mix with a fork into a crumbly topping
Open the air fryer and remove the foil
Sprinkle the topping on top of the apples
Close air fryer and set timer for 5 minutes
Remove the   from the air fryer and cool slightly
